   <meta content="truth, people, 'divine love', god, jesus, 'james e padgett', love, angels, divine, peace, 'truth for all', 'truth for people', teachings, 'jesus christ', truths, celestial, world, apostles, truths, 'spiritual messages', christ, revelation, 'celestial heavens', spiritual, spirits, prayer, soulmates, 'the new birth','soul mates', messages, soul, transformation, immortality, religion, mankind, videos, 'celestial kingdom', redeemed, redemption, man, 'the padgett messages', world, earth, 'the truth', angelic, channeling, stories, 'about truth', 'truth for', 'truth about', 'the real truth', 'truth for all " name="keywords"/>
   <meta content="Truth for all people. Divine Love is the greatest thing in all God's universe, and that with its coming into the soul, comes peace and happiness and joy, and a knowledge that the Father is a real, existing, present Father of the most wonderful tenderness and Love." name="description"/>
   <meta content="Joomla! - Open Source Content Management" name="generator"/>

    Truth for all people - Divine Love God Soul Spirit Life Jesus Truths
   </title>

   <style type="text/css">
    .layout#kunena + div { display: block !important;}

  .pagination>li>a, .pagination>li>span{color:#005723;text-shadow:0 0 10px #84d1a4} .pagination>li.active>a, .pagination>li.active>span, .pagination>li>a:focus, .pagination>li>a:hover, .pagination>li>span:focus, .pagination>li>span:hover{color:#005723;background-color:#84d1a4} .vb_video_cont, .vb_video_cont a, .vb_video_frame{color:#005723} #vbiClose:focus, #vbiClose:hover, .vb_video_cont a:focus, .vb_video_cont a:focus .vb_thub_wrap .vb-icon-play, .vb_video_cont a:hover, .vb_video_cont a:hover .vb_thub_wrap .vb-icon-play, .vb_video_cont:focus, .vb_video_cont:focus .vb_thub_wrap .vb-icon-play, .vb_video_cont:hover, .vb_video_cont:hover .vb_thub_wrap .vb-icon-play{color:#84d1a4} #vbiWrap{color:#005723} .vb_slider_outer .vb_slider_next:focus, .vb_slider_outer .vb_slider_next:hover, .vb_slider_outer .vb_slider_prev:focus, .vb_slider_outer .vb_slider_prev:hover{color:#84d1a4} .vb_slider_outer{color:#005723} #vbCloseLink:focus, #vbCloseLink:hover, .vjs-big-play-button:focus, .vjs-big-play-button:hover, .vjs-fullscreen-control:hover, .vjs-play-control:hover, .vjs-volume-menu-button:focus, .vjs-volume-menu-button:hover{color:#84d1a4}

        <div class="web-layout-cell web-content">
         <article class="web-post web-messages">
          <div class="web-postcontent clearfix">
           <div id="system-message-container">
           </div>
          </div>
         </article>
         <div class="blog-featured">
          <article class="web-post">
           <h2 class="web-postheader">
            Truth For All People Divine Love God Soul Spirit Life Jesus Truths
           </h2>
          </article>
          <div class="items-leading">
           <div class="leading-0">
            <article class="web-post">
             <div class="web-postcontent clearfix">
              <div class="web-article">
               <p style="text-align: center;">
                <span style="font-size: 12pt;">
                 <strong>
                  <span style="color: #000080; font-family: verdana, geneva, sans-serif;">
                   Truth For All People
                  </span>
                 </strong>
                </span>
               </p>
               <p style="text-align: left;">
                Messages from Jesus and Celestial Angels explaining the way to God and the salvation of the soul received through the greatest medium the world has ever seen, James E. Padgett who was chosen by Jesus to write down his second revelation of truths to the world.
               </p>
               <p style="text-align: left;">
                <span style="color: #000080;">
                 <strong>
                  <img alt="Jesus Praying" class="pull-right" height="274" src="/images/stories/jesus_prayer.jpg" style="float: right; margin: 5px;" title="Pray with me" width="141"/>
                 </strong>
                </span>
               </p>
               <p style="text-align: left;">
                Here are some excerpts from the messages.
               </p>
               <p>
                <span class="fbl">
                 <img alt="" src="/images/M_images/blockcontentbullets.png"/>
                 <a href="/the-divine-love-of-god/90-the-power-of-divine-love-to-redeem-men-from-sin-and-error">
                  <strong>
                   God's Divine Love has the power to change the most hardened sinner into a true child of God,
                  </strong>
                 </a>
                 if only through faith and prayer such sinner will seek for it. Let this love take possession of a man or spirit and its power to purify and change the heart of that man or spirit never fails.
                </span>
               </p>
               <p>
                <span class="fbl">
                 <a href="/meaning-of-life-on-earth/113-verily-verily-i-say-unto-you-he-that-believeth-on-me-the-works-that-i-do-shall-he-do-also">
                  <strong>
                   <img alt="" src="/images/M_images/blockcontentbullets.png"/>
                   Belief and Faith are not the same; one is of the mind, the other of the soul.
                  </strong>
                 </a>
                 One can and does change as phenomena and apparent facts change; the other, when truly possessed, never changes. For faith possessed by a soul causes all the longings and aspirations of that soul to become things of real existence; which, like the house that is built upon the solid rock, can never be shaken or destroyed.
                </span>
               </p>
               <p>
                <span class="fbl">
                 <img alt="" src="/images/M_images/blockcontentbullets.png"/>
                </span>
                <span class="fbl">
                 <a href="/judgment-a-forgiveness/189-divine-forgiveness">
                  <strong>
                   The Love of the Father comes only into a man's soul when he seeks It in prayer and faith
                  </strong>
                 </a>
                 , and of course this implies that he wills It to come to him. No man is ever refused this Love when he properly asks for It.
                </span>
               </p>
               <p style="text-align: left;">
                <span class="fbl">
                 <img alt="" src="/images/M_images/blockcontentbullets.png"/>
                </span>
                <span class="fbl">
                 <a href="/the-divine-love-of-god/83-how-the-divine-love-enters-into-the-soul-of-a-human-being">
                  <strong>
                   One little moment of this true praying
                  </strong>
                 </a>
                 will be more effective in causing this divine love to flow towards the soul, than a whole lifetime of idle repetition or prayers that come from a source merely mental.
                </span>
               </p>
               <p style="text-align: left;">
                <a href="/tfap-forum" rel="alternate" title="Forum for Truth for All People ">
                 <em>
                  <span class="fbl">
                   <span class="fbl">
                    <span class="fbl">
                     <img alt="" src="/images/stories/ThumbsTFAP/forum.gif"/>
                     <span style="font-size: 12pt;">
                      <strong>
                       TFAP Forum
                      </strong>
                     </span>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </span>
                 </em>
                </a>
               </p>
               <p style="text-align: left;">
                <em>
                 <span class="fbl">
                  I believe, if people knew what GOD was offering them, they would not hesitate to gladly, and in humility and thankfully, accept it.
                 </span>
                </em>
               </p>
              </div>
              <p class="readmore">
               <a class="readon web-button" href="/message-categories/the-divine-love-of-god/1-jesus-messages-for-all-people">
                Read more ...
               </a>
              </p>
             </div>
            </article>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="items-row cols-1 row-0">
           <div class="item column-1">
            <article class="web-post">
             <div class="web-postcontent clearfix">
              <div class="web-article">
               <p align="center" class="MsoNormal">
                <span style="font-family: verdana, geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">
                 <strong>
                  The Divine Love of the Father and
                  <br/>
                  the New Birth of the Soul
                 </strong>
                </span>
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal">
                I am here, Jesus;
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal">
                God is a God of Love, and no man can come to Him unless he receives the Love of the Father in his soul.
                <br/>
                As men are inclined to sin and error and the
                <img alt="Sermon on the mount" height="163" src="/images/stories/JesusTFAP/jesus_on_the_mount.jpg" style="float: left; margin: 2px;" width="120"/>
                violation of God's Laws, they can be redeemed from sin by obtaining this Love; and that can be obtained only through prayer and faith in the willingness of God to bestow this Love upon whosoever may ask for It. I do not mean that there must be "formal" prayers, or compliance with any church creeds or dogmas.
                <br/>
                <br/>
                The prayer that is efficacious is that which emanates from the soul and earnest aspirations of a man.
                <br/>
                <br/>
                So let men know that unless they have the real soul longings for this Love, it will not be given to them. No mere intellectual desires will suffice. The intellect is not that faculty in man that unites him to God, only the soul is made in the likeness of the Father, and unless this likeness is perfected by a filling of the soul with the Divine Love of the Father, the likeness is never complete. Love is the One Great Thing in God's economy of real existence. Without it, all would be chaos and unhappiness; but where it exists harmony and happiness also exist.  .....
               </p>
              </div>
              <p class="readmore">
               <a class="readon web-button" href="/message-categories/the-divine-love-of-god/79-the-divine-love-of-the-father-and-the-new-birth-of-the-soul">
                Read more ...
               </a>
              </p>
             </div>
            </article>
           </div>
           <span class="row-separator">
           </span>
          </div>
          <div class="items-row cols-1 row-1">
           <div class="item column-1">
            <article class="web-post">
             <div class="web-postcontent clearfix">
              <div class="web-article">
               <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: center;">
                <span style="font-size: 12px;">
                 <span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">
                  <strong>
                   <span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: verdana, geneva, sans-serif;">
                    How the Divine Love Enters the Soul of a
                   </span>
                   <br/>
                   <span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: verdana, geneva, sans-serif;">
                    Human Being
                   </span>
                   <br/>
                  </strong>
                 </span>
                </span>
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left;">
                <span style="color: black; font-size: 10pt;">
                 I am here, Jesus;
                </span>
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left;">
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 I have already explained to you the difference between and the respective functions of the physical body, the spiritual body and the soul, and how the real
                 <img alt="Jesus in white" height="170" src="/images/stories/JesusTFAP/jesus_man_bowing.jpg" style="float: right; margin: 2px;" width="120"/>
                 man is the soul, which may live forever.
                </span>
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left;">
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 I have also shown you how the physical and spiritual bodies change their component parts, and as such bodies, disintegrated and disappear in the form that they may have at any one time. Well, the soul is the man and may become the angel of God's kingdom. The soul may also become only the everlasting part of man in the spiritual kingdom, as contradistinguished from the celestial heavens.
                </span>
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: left;">
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 The only way in which the soul may become an inhabitant of the celestial spheres, is by its obtaining of the divine love and thereby become a partaker of the divine nature of the Father, and this can be accomplished only by the inflowing of the divine love by means of the operation of the Holy Spirit, which is the instrumentality used by God to carry this love to the souls of men. This love never forces itself....
                </span>
               </p>
              </div>
              <p class="readmore">
               <a class="readon web-button" href="/message-categories/the-divine-love-of-god/83-how-the-divine-love-enters-into-the-soul-of-a-human-being">
                Read more ...
               </a>
              </p>
             </div>
            </article>
           </div>
           <span class="row-separator">
           </span>
          </div>
          <div class="items-row cols-1 row-2">
           <div class="item column-1">
            <article class="web-post">
             <div class="web-postcontent clearfix">
              <div class="web-article">
               <p align="center">
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 <strong>
                  The Soul of Man
                 </strong>
                 <br/>
                 <strong>
                  The Soul: What It Is and What It is Not
                 </strong>
                </span>
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal">
                I am here, Jesus;
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal">
                I come tonight to write my message on the soul, and will do so if we can establish the necessary rapport.
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal">
                Well, the subject is of vast importance and difficult to explain, for there is nothing on earth known to man with which a comparison
                <img alt="Jesus chatting" height="178" src="/images/stories/thumbs_Jesus1/jesus51.jpg" style="float: left; margin: 2px;" width="120"/>
                may be made. Generally, men cannot understand truth, or the nature of things, except by comparison with what they already know to exist, and whose qualities and characteristics they are acquainted with.
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal">
                There is nothing in the material world that will afford a basis of comparison with the soul; hence it is difficult for men to comprehend the nature and qualities of the soul by the mere intellectual perceptions and reason. In order to understand the nature of this great creation, the soul, men must have something of a spiritual development, and the possession of what may be known as the soul perceptions.
               </p>
               <p class="MsoNormal">
                Only soul can understand soul, and the soul that seeks to comprehend the nature of itself must be a live soul, with its faculties developed to a small degree, at least First, I will say that the human soul must be a creature of God, and not an Emanation from Him as a part of His Soul. And when men speak and teach that the human soul is a part of the Oversoul, they teach what is not true. This soul is merely a creature of the Father, just as are the other parts of man, such as the intellect, the spirit body, and the material body; and which, before its creation, had no existence.
               </p>
              </div>
              <p class="readmore">
               <a class="readon web-button" href="/message-categories/the-soul-about-the-soul/99-the-soul-what-it-is-and-what-it-is-not">
                Read more ...
               </a>
              </p>
             </div>
            </article>
           </div>
           <span class="row-separator">
           </span>
          </div>
          <div class="pagination">
           <p class="counter">

           </p>
